languages.text: "Про... Простите, Лорд-капитан". {n}Женщина шумно втягивает воздух.{/n} "Мы не забудем вашей милости. Дайте нам оружие и один патрон, пошлите вперед! Твари ответят за все. Даже смерть милосерднее, чем ложная надежда".
languages.translation_comment: конец диалога, пленники встают и присоединяются к отряду
конец диалога, пленники встают и присоединяются к отряду

languages.text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."
languages.original_text: "Про... Простите, Лорд-капитан". {n}Женщина шумно втягивает воздух.{/n} "Мы не забудем вашей милости. Дайте нам оружие и один патрон, пошлите вперед! Твари ответят за все. Даже смерть милосерднее, чем ложная надежда".

traits.locale_text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and lead on! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."
"For... Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a noisy breath.{/n} "We will not forget your mercy. The creatures will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

"For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and lead on! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."
"For... Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We will not forget your mercy. The creatures will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

"For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

"For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and lead on! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

"For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

languages.text: «Pe... perdónenos, Lord Capitán». {n}La mujer toma aliento, temblorosa.{/n} «Nunca olvidaremos su piedad. ¡Denos armas y munición y mándenos a la batalla! Esa chusma responderá por sus crímenes. Hasta la muerte es más digna que la falsa esperanza».
languages.original_text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

traits.locale_text: «Pe... perdónenos, Lord Capitán». {n}La mujer toma aliento, temblorosa.{/n} «Nunca olvidaremos su piedad. ¡Denos armas y munición y mándenos a la batalla! Esa chusma responderá por sus crímenes. Hasta la muerte es más digna que la falsa esperanza».

languages.text: 「お…お許しください、ロード・キャプテン」{n}女は、震えながら息を吐く。{/n}「あなた様のご慈悲を決して忘れません。 私たちに武器と弾薬を与え、前線へ送ってください！あの野郎どもはすべての罪を償うでしょう。偽りの希望より、死の方がまだ優しいです」
languages.original_text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

traits.locale_text: 「お…お許しください、ロード・キャプテン」{n}女は、震えながら息を吐く。{/n}「あなた様のご慈悲を決して忘れません。 私たちに武器と弾薬を与え、前線へ送ってください！あの野郎どもはすべての罪を償うでしょう。偽りの希望より、死の方がまだ優しいです」

languages.text: “求……求您原谅我们，舰长大人。”{n}女人颤抖着，深吸一口气。{/n}“我们永远不会忘记您的仁慈。把武器和弹药分给我们，让我们上战场吧！那些该死的混蛋，他们一定会付出代价。哪怕是死亡，也比虚假的希望更加仁慈。”
languages.original_text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

traits.locale_text: “求……求您原谅我们，舰长大人。”{n}女人颤抖着，深吸一口气。{/n}“我们永远不会忘记您的仁慈。把武器和弹药分给我们，让我们上战场吧！那些该死的混蛋，他们一定会付出代价。哪怕是死亡，也比虚假的希望更加仁慈。”

languages.text: Ver... vergebt uns, Lord Captain. {n}Die Frau atmet zitternd ein.{/n}"Wir werden Eure Gnade nicht vergessen. Gebt uns Waffen und Munition und schickt uns in den Kampf! Die Bastarde werden für alles büßen. Selbst der Tod ist besser als falsche Hoffnung."
languages.original_text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

traits.locale_text: Ver... vergebt uns, Lord Captain. {n}Die Frau atmet zitternd ein.{/n}"Wir werden Eure Gnade nicht vergessen. Gebt uns Waffen und Munition und schickt uns in den Kampf! Die Bastarde werden für alles büßen. Selbst der Tod ist besser als falsche Hoffnung."

languages.text: « Par... pardonnez-nous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}La femme prend une inspiration tremblante.{/n} « Nous n'oublierons pas votre miséricorde. Fournissez-nous des armes et des munitions, et nous nous chargerons du reste ! Ces vermines répondront de leurs crimes. Même la mort est plus douce que les faux espoirs. »
languages.original_text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."

traits.locale_text: « Par... pardonnez-nous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}La femme prend une inspiration tremblante.{/n} « Nous n'oublierons pas votre miséricorde. Fournissez-nous des armes et des munitions, et nous nous chargerons du reste ! Ces vermines répondront de leurs crimes. Même la mort est plus douce que les faux espoirs. »

languages.text: "Bizi... Bizi affedin Lord Kaptan." {n}Kadın, titrek bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Merhametinizi unutmayacağız. Elimize silah ve bir şarjör cephane verin. Sonra da bizi gönderin. O şerefsizler, yaptıkları her şeyin hesabını verecekler. Ölüm bile boş beklentiden iyidir."
languages.original_text: "For— Forgive us, Lord Captain." {n}The woman draws a quivering breath.{/n} "We won't forget your mercy. Give us weapons and a round of ammunition and send us forward! The bastards will answer for everything. Even death is kinder than false hope."
